NAME: Names, Regional
DESC: Similar to the Names data type, except it tries to generate names mapped to the country; e.g. Italian names appear when the data set row has Italy for the country field. Not as performant as Names.
helpIntro: Because of this additional complexity, however, the code runs slightly slower. You can specify multiple formats by separating them with the pipe (|) character. The following strings will be converted to their random name equivalent:
incompleteFields: The Name data type needs to have the format entered in the Options text field. Please fix the following rows:
name: Name
exampleFullnames: Alex Smith or Alex J. Smith
typeName: A first name, male or female.
